title: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When using code assist, the file is marked as 'dirtied' even though no changes have been made to the file.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as 'dirtied' or indicate that changes have been made to the file.
SR:
1. Open the file in the editor.
2. Trigger code assist without making any changes.
3. Check if the file is marked as 'dirtied' or indicates that changes have been made.
